Every turn in combat makes you more exhausted. More the effect accumulates more severe consequences it causes, until death.
Twice a day Short Rest weakens the effect, Long Rest removes it completely.
This creature will die at the end of his turn.
This creature should pass constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">saving throw</LSTag> DC [1] every turn or fall asleep.

This creature fought for a long time and exhausted its strength. It takes [1] penalty on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and spell <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag>.
This creature has successfully passed constitution check and became temporarily immune to effects of sleep deprivation.
